Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards

Class ExistingRumourCards

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.ExistingRumourCards
public final class ExistingRumourCards extends Object

Singleton containing a set of all existing Rumour cards.

Can be instantiated only once, using the getInstance() method.

At instantiation, creates a set and instantiates all existing Rumour cards. When adding a new Rumour card to the game, call its constructor in this class' constructor. Each type of Rumour card must have an unique instance within this class' set.

Rumour cards should only be instantiated by this class, as there must exist no duplicate instances of a same type of Rumour card.

See Also:
  • RumourCard
  • Tabletop::getAllCardsPile()

    • getInstanceByClass

      public static RumourCard getInstanceByClass(Class cls)
      Returns the instance of the unique extension of RumourCard that is of the given class, contained within the set of existing Rumour cards.
      Parameters:
      cls - The class corresponding to a type of Rumour card. For example, AngryMob.class.
      Returns:
      The instance of the unique Rumour card of the given class.
      See Also:
      • RumourCard
      • Used by each CPU Players' chosen strategy to associate each existing Rumour Card with a value.
